name: Item Price Creation
Company Wise Naming Series in Quotation
script:
company = doc.company
doctype = "Quotation"

# Query the custom 'Company Naming Series' Doctype for matching naming series
naming_series = frappe.db.get_value(
    "Document Series by Company",
    {"company": company, "doctype_name": doctype},
    "naming_series"
)

if naming_series:
    # Set the naming series based on the fetched value
    doc.naming_series = naming_series
